concept.title: Enabling Kerberos Authentication
concept.shortdesc: You can use Kerberos authentication to connect to origin and destination systems, as well as YARN clusters.

conbody.p: Data Collector configuration fileenabling Kerberos authenticaionKerberos authenticationenabling for the Data CollectorThe user connects to external systems. By default, the Data Collector user is the user who starts the Data Collector. When you enable Kerberos, the Data Collector user is the Kerberos principal.

To enable Kerberos authentication, perform the following steps:
Configure the to use Kerberos - Configure the Kerberos properties to enable Kerberos and define the principal and keytab in the configuration file.
Configure the origin or destination stage to use Kerberos - You can configure Kerberos authentication for the following stages:
Hadoop FS origin
Hadoop FS destination
HBase destination Cluster pipelines automatically use Kerberos authentication if the YARN cluster requires it and Kerberos is enabled for the .
